page.title: 05A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: The day started with (assembly). We heard stories and sang hymns. When assembly was finished we either did reading sheets or drew pictures because half of the class was doing (cycling proficiency) where they learned how to ride a bike properly. I did my (Ginn 36O) reading sheets. the story was (The Ugly Duckling). I had to answer question about the story. Then the bell rang. (Spelling) was next. We got a test of words and they were all about science. I got 13 out of 15. Then we wrote out our spellings for the next test. We had to learn them at home. After dinner I went to the class. We did (Art). In art I put paper over my map with paste to make a relief model. Then we got Singing. We sang (Brer Rabbit) songs.
